title: Light slab-ish serif from md70
content:
I know it is similar to [Madawaska Ultra Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20090415015954/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/madawaska/ultralight/waterfall.html) but not quite...

Seen on home page at [md70â€™s website](http://web.archive.org/web/20090415015954/http:/md70.com/)

Thanks in advance!

Eleanor
author: eleanorrogers

comments.content:
Not an exact match, but Shinn Bodoni Egyptian Thin might be a workable replacement.

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/bodoni-egyptian/thin/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090415015954/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/bodoni-egyptian/thin/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/bodoni-egyptian/thin/")
